com.zhukovsd.graphs

Class GraphView<T extends Graph<U>,U extends Vertex<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.graphs.GraphView<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of represented graph
    U - type of vertex of represented graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DualGraphView, EmbeddedGraphView, SubGraphView

    public abstract class GraphView<T extends Graph<U>,U extends Vertex<U>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of graph, which can be painted on java.awt.Graphics2D object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private T graph
      Graph object, represented by current view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphView(T graph)
      Create representation for given graph.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.awt.Point calculateVertexPosition(U vertex)
      Abstract method for calculating vertex position in current view representation.
      protected T getGraph()
      Getter for typed graph, may be overrode if graph have to be specific of specific type, derived from T.
      abstract java.awt.Point getSize()
      Abstract method for calculating size of image, representing current view.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
      Paint whole view on given graphics object with black color and 1 pixel width stroke.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Stroke stroke)
      Paint whole view on given graphics object with given color and stroke.
      protected void paintEdge(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, Edge<U> edge)
      Paint given link on given graphics object.
      protected void paintVertex(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, U vertex)
      Paint given vertex on given graphics object.

        protected T getGraph()
        Getter for typed graph, may be overrode if graph have to be specific of specific type, derived from T.

        public abstract java.awt.Point getSize()
        Abstract method for calculating size of image, representing current view. Must be overrode in derived class.
        Returns:
        image size as Point object

      • calculateVertexPosition

        public abstract java.awt.Point calculateVertexPosition(U vertex)
        Abstract method for calculating vertex position in current view representation. Must be overrode in derived class.
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex to calculate position of
        Returns:
        vertex position as Point object

                           U vertex)
        Paint given vertex on given graphics object.
        Parameters:

        vertex - vertex object to paint

      • paintEdge

        protected void paintEdge(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                         Edge<U> edge)
        Paint given link on given graphics object.
        Parameters:
        graphics - graphics object to paint on
        edge - edge object to paint

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                  java.awt.Color color,
                  java.awt.Stroke stroke)
        Paint whole view on given graphics object with given color and stroke. In pair of opposite-directional edges, which connects same vertexes, only one edge will be painted.
        Parameters:
        graphics - graphics object to paint on
        color - color which will be used for painting
        stroke - stroke which will be used for painting

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
        Paint whole view on given graphics object with black color and 1 pixel width stroke.
        Parameters:
        graphics - graphics object to paint on
